scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && npm run build:md && astro dev
scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p public/api-specs && rm -rf public/FF_img public/img_webhook_flows public/img && [ -d src/assets/shared/img ] && cp -r src/assets/shared/img public/ || true && [ -d src/assets/shared/FF_img ] && cp -r src/assets/shared/FF_img public/ || true && [ -d src/content/docs/version-3.0/img_webhook_flows ] && cp -r src/content/docs/version-3.0/img_webhook_flows public/ || true && [ -d src/api-reference/specs ] && cp -r src/api-reference/specs/* public/api-specs/ || true && node scripts/translate.mjs --incremental
scripts.build:md: node scripts/generate-md.mjs && node scripts/generate-llms.mjs && node scripts/generate-platform-llms-full.mjs
scripts.build:md:prod: node scripts/generate-md.mjs ../build && node scripts/generate-llms.mjs ../build && node scripts/generate-platform-llms-full.mjs ../build
